name: The "think" tool from Claude
tagline: Enabling Claude to stop and think
description: With the "think" tool, we're giving Claude the ability to include an additional thinking step—complete with its own designated space—as part of getting to its final answer.

name: Dodo Payments
tagline: Global Payments That Never Go Extinct
description: With tens of payment integrations under the hood, we make global payments effortless, with ridiculously high success rates and the widest range of local payment methods—whether it’s UPI in India, PIX in Brazil, Klarna in US, or SEPA in Europe.

name: world's worst website lol
tagline: i built the worlds worst website using AI in databutton
description: i created a soul-destroying website. it's a professional's worst nightmare. why did i do it? why shoulnd't i? someone had to do it. also find me on linkedin at https://www.linkedin.com/in/iammiloai/ if you're into ai stuff

name: StarVector
tagline: Generate SVG code from images and text
description: StarVector combines visual and linguistic processing through a multimodal architecture to produce high-quality SVG code from images or text instructions. StarVector redefines vectorization as a code generation problem to leverage the richness of SVG syntax.

name: Copilot for Gaming
tagline: Your AI-Powered Xbox Sidekick
description: Copilot for Gaming is An AI assistant for Xbox gamers. Get personalized recommendations, game setup help, and (eventually) in-game coaching. Starts on mobile.

name: Scoutt.it
tagline: Portfolio builder for non-front-end web developers
description: Build your online developers portfolio online that non-techies like managers, recruiters and HR want to read, without thinking about design and responsiveness.

name: Skywork-R1V
tagline: Pioneering multimodal reasoning with CoT
description: Skywork-R1V is the open-source multimodal reasoning model. Excels at visual math, science, and complex reasoning.

name: Rezume
tagline: Resumes That Make Recruiters Say "Yes"
description: Hate writing Resumes? We've got you covered. With Rezume just answer a simple quiz, and we'll generate a professional, ATS-friendly resume in seconds. Designed for impact, optimized with right keywords, and visually stunning- so you can stand out effortlessly.

name: Chromatic AI
tagline: Create AI UGCs for TikTok & more.
description: What is Chromatic AI? Chromatic AI helps you level up your distribution. Create UGCs for TikTok, analyze ads, and discover what your competitors are doing - powered by AI agents.

name: System Design on AWS
tagline: Learn to build and scale enterprise solutions
description: Authors Jayanth Kumar and Mandeep Singh equip software architects and engineers with essential AWS and system design knowledge to help you make good decisions and overcome the challenges of designing and scaling enterprise software architecture.

name: Interview.Codes
tagline: AI-powered real-time voice coding Mock Interviews
description: InterviewCodes is the best way to prepare and ace coding interviews. It provides you with unlimited mock interview sessions, real-time AI feedback, and practice problems, ensuring you’re fully ready when it counts.

name: Atwork Form Studio
tagline: AI-Powered Form builder
description: Atwork is an all-in-one no-code Work OS that simplifies task, project, and CRM administration. With a simple, versatile, and powerful platform, you can automate processes, manage data, and improve collaboration without scripting.

name: Cooksync
tagline: Collect recipes from anywhere, store them your way
description: Build your own cookbook by collecting recipes from social media, websites, and more - then sync them automatically to your favorite spaces such as Obsidian and Notion. Cooksync is the transport layer for your recipes, not another place to manage them.

name: AI marketing plan generator
tagline: Write marketing plan in 15 minutes
description: Tired of staring at a blank marketing plan? Say goodbye to overwhelm—get a complete, step‑by‑step strategy (with budget, KPIs & SWOT) in under 15 minutes. No expertise needed, no monthly fees—just a one‑time $9.99 solution.

name: AI Charades HUB
tagline: Charades game with community, AI and no paywall
description: Charades is a game where you place your phone in front of your forehead. Then you try to guess as many words displayed on your phone as you can from clues given by your friends in a limited time. Words come from themed decks like Popular Movies, Animals...

name: Camira
tagline: Camera Mirroring and Remote Contol App for Apple Devices.
description: You know the rear camera takes better photos, but you can’t see the screen while using it. Camira lets you mirror your iPhone’s camera feed to another Apple device and control it remotely. See yourself before you click, stop rushing the timer and snap afar!

name: Substotal
tagline: Manage all your subscriptions in one place and save money.
description: Substotal is a subscription tracker that helps you visualize your recurring expenses. No account required—your data stays on your device. Optionally sync across devices. It's the quickest way to find out where your money is going every month.

name: SettleFast
tagline: The easiest way to split expenses with your friends
description: SettleFast helps you split expenses with friends effortlessly. Track shared costs, minimize transactions, and generate detailed PDF reports—all in one app.

name: Content Pilot
tagline: Transform video content into multiple creative assets
description: Content Pilot is an AI-powered platform that helps content creators maximize the value of their video content by automatically transforming YouTube videos into multiple high-quality content assets such as, new script, blog posts, metadata, thumbnails, & more.

name: GeoLearnAI
tagline: Explore the World, One Country at a Time
description: Explore the World, One Country at a Time! GeoLearn's interactive 3D globe and smart AI guide make exploring the world fun. Create custom lessons, bookmark cool spots, quiz yourself, and impress locals on your next adventure. Your journey starts here!
